Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Damicornin (coral peptide, XXA; 3S=S; natural AMPs; UCSS1a; Cnidaria, invertebrates, marine animals)
Sequence Information.Source: the cauliflower coral or lace coral,Pocillopora damicornis

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this peptide is most similar (43.5%) toAurelin.Chemical modification:  C-terminal NH2.Activity: Active against Gram+ B. megaterium (souchier IBMC) (MIC 20 uM), S. aureus SG511 (MIC 5 uM), M. luteus A270 (MIC 1.25 uM), B. stationis CIP 101282 (MIC 10 uM), M. maritypicum CIP 105733T (MIC 20 uM), Gram- E. coli SBS 363 (MIC 10 uM), and fungus F. oxysporum (MIC 1.25 uM).The original entry Bombinin GH-1L (inactive) has been replaced 9/2020.Updated 4/2024
Literature Information.Author: Vidal-Dupiol J, Ladrière O, Destoumieux-Garzón D, Sautière PE, Meistertzheim AL, Tambutté E, Tambutté S, Duval D, Fouré L, Adjeroud M, Mitta G.2011
Literature Information.Title: Innate immune responses of a scleractinian coral to vibriosis
